sentences.en: A calf was offered up as a sacrifice to the goddess.
sentences.cn: 向女神祭献了一头牺牲小牛.

sentences.en: Each cow normally produces only one calf at a time.
sentences.cn: 在一般情况下,一头母牛每次只能产一头牛犊.

sentences.en: He expects to have recovered from his calf injury in time.
sentences.cn: 他期望小腿后部的伤能够及时复元.

sentences.en: He suffered a pulled calf muscle.
Hillsden was complain-ing of cramp in his calf muscles.
sentences.cn: 希尔斯登说他小腿抽筋。

sentences.en: I rubbed the velvety grooves inside the calf's ears.
sentences.cn: 我摩挲着小牛耳朵里面柔软的凹槽。

sentences.en: I'll wring his calf's head off his body with these hands.
sentences.cn: 我要用这双手将他那牛脖子拧下来.

sentences.en: In - calf heifers are admirable for this work.
sentences.cn: 怀小牛的小母牛最适合这项工作.

sentences.en: She done have a calf las'night.
sentences.cn: 它昨天晚上下了个牛犊呢.

sentences.en: The aunt stands guard and helps the mother with her newborn calf.
sentences.cn: 这位“阿姨”负责站岗和帮助象妈妈照顾刚出生的小家伙.

sentences.en: The calf blared for its mother.
sentences.cn: 牛犊哞哞地高声叫喊找妈妈.
那头母牛早产了一头小牛犊

sentences.en: The newborn calf fears no tigers.
The snow, except where it drifted, was only calf-deep.
sentences.cn: 除了吹得堆积起来的地方，雪只有小腿肚深。

words.tran_cn: 产犊（calve的过去式及过去分词）
[解剖]腓肠，小腿；[印刷]小牛；小牛皮

phrases.tran_cn: 初恋；早恋（指少男少女之间短暂的爱情）
肥牛犊；最好的款待[来自《圣经》]
金牛犊（源出《圣经·出埃及记》）；金钱

trans.tran_en: the part of the back of your leg between your knee and your  ankle
